title: LifeSong
description: The soundtrack to your life may be hazardous to your healthLifeSong the app that puts some groove in your day! Imagine an App that plays a different song every morning, just for you! LifeSong puts energy into that bland morning routine.This short story follows the life of Thomas, a seemingly mild, if not slightly downtrodden pencil pusher though his work week with the LifeSong App. Having recently downloaded the LifeSong app, Thomas work week starts with a burst of energy and a “take on the world” vibe. As the week wears on, stranger and stranger things start to happen. Thomas finds himself riding a whirlwind of emotion and increasingly bizarre events unfold as he wonders if the universe is playing a cruel joke on him or if he will even make it to Friday.LifeSong is the perfect short read for anyone wanting a story that not only entertains but is also thought-provoking.
author: Carol James Marshall
